text: José Manuel Hermosa Melis (born 23 April 1989) is a Spanish footballer who plays for CF La Nucía. Mainly a left back, he can also appear as a left midfielder. ==Football career== Born in Villajoyosa, Alicante, Valencia, Hermosa was a product of Villarreal CF's youth system, and made senior debuts with the C-team in the 2007–08 campaign, in Tercera División. In the 2009 summer he moved to Atlético Madrid, being also assigned to the C's. In June 2010 Hermosa was promoted to the reserves in Segunda División B, but only started in six matches during the season. In July of the following year he moved to another reserve team, CA Osasuna B also in the third level.El nuevo promesas echa a andar (The new Promesas starts walking); Diario de Navarra, 15 July 2011 Hermosa made his first team debut on 12 January 2012, replacing fellow youth graduate Eneko Satrústegui in the 72nd minute of a 1–2 home loss against FC Barcelona, for the season's Copa del Rey.Messi enciende las antiniebla (Messi turns fog lamps on); Marca, 13 January 2012 He spent the vast majority of his spell with the B-side, and was released in May 2013. On 31 January 2014 Hermosa signed for Ontinyent CF.Abenza y Hermosa completan la renovación del Ontinyent (Abenza and Hermosa completes Ontinyent's renovation); El Mundo Deportivo, 31 January 2014 He appeared in 12 matches during the campaign, also suffering relegation, and moved to fellow league team Marbella FC on 5 August.José Hermosa, décimo fichaje para la próxima temporada (José Hermosa, tenth signing for the following season) ; Marbella's official website, 5 August 2014 On 30 January 2015 Hermosa was loaned to Lucena CF also in the third division, until June.El Lucena refuerza su plantilla con los atacantes José Hermosa y Adrián Ruiz (Lucena bolsters squad with forwards José Hermosa and Adrián Ruiz) ; Lucena Hoy, 30 January 2015 ==References== ==External links== * *Futbolme profile * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:People from Marina Baixa Category:Spanish footballers Category:Valencian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Association football midfielders Category:Segunda División B players Category:Tercera División players Category:Atlético Madrid C players Category:Atlético Madrid B players Category:CA Osasuna B players Category:CA Osasuna players Category:Ontinyent CF players Category:Lucena CF players Category:CD Alcoyano footballers Category:Spain youth international footballers
title: José Manuel Hermosa Melis
